name: COMPUTER SCIENCE

name: Bachelor of Commerce

name: Bechelor of ART
Description: The School of Arts, Design and Architecture is one of the most prestigious universities in its fields. We educate our students to create imaginative, collaborative, compassionate and unconventional approaches to the most pressing challenges of today.

name: Marketing & Creative
